title: Mothers of Invention:Cruising with Ruben & the Jets (orig vinyl)
description:
Original vinyl version of this classic Mothers of Invention album.

Mastered using Wave Corrector & Goldwave & Audiograbber (all utterly magnificent for this type of thing) by MCReptile. 

Relatively noise-free compared to other examples of this album that are available, partly because of the time I took using the tools mentioned above. No EQ or extra compression has been applied - this is a flat transfer from my vinyl copy which is in immaculate condition.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Trivial poop department:

The version of Cheap Thrills on the vinyl is noticeably higher in pitch (4% or so, if I calculated correctly) than the later bowdlerized CD version. 

The other CD tracks are mostly the same pitch as the original vinyl versions presented here, although the change in instrumentation (with inappropriate-sounding bass and drum overdubs) and the radical remix on the CD makes it hard to tell at times even when listening to the two versions 'back to back'. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Anyway, this is the original (and best) version so kick back and enjoy.

Hotcha!

MCReptile
